mods.abstract: Performance of I Need You Like A Hole In The Head, written by Tillman Franks, Shot Jackson, and Wayne Walker, and performed by Webb Pierce on a radio program. Webb Pierce advertises the Louisiana Hayride program that will be happening that night with appearances by Tillman Franks, Ramblin' Tommy Scott, Wilburn Family, Carolina Sunshine Girls [unconfirmed], Johnny Johnson [unconfirmed], Red Sovine and the Echo Valley Boys, Jimmy Lee, Bob Eaton [phonetic; unconfirmed], Buddy Attaway, Clayton McMichen, and the final performance from Slim Whitman. Broadcast is most likely from KWKH (Shreveport, La.).
